name: P. Scott Makela
biography:
Born in the St. Paul Minnesota in 1960.  
Recieved Bachelor's of Science from University of Minnesota and recieved BFA from Minneapolis College of Art and Design in 1985 and MFA at Cranbrook in 1991.
Digitally-based designed who worked in graphics, video, film for such clients as Nike, Sony Music,  Warner Bros., MTV, and Kodak.
Wife, head of design at Walker Center of Art.
Died on May 7, 1999 at age of 39.
